Review.Titre: Cheap Webhosting service with a catch
Review.Contenu: I have worked with many of these hosting companies in many years.  I just encountered this OrangeHost very recently and I will give you my 5 cent worth review on them.First of all, it is cheap.  Price isn't everything when you are looking to host a website, but for many non-essential bloggers and casual web user probably that is the main issue with many of these types of providers.Fine, with that being said, the cheap comes with shortcomings.  Yup shortcomings.  If you are looking for business use hosting, OrangeHost is not definitely one of choices you would want to get.The major problem is their server and line speed is what you get for your money level SLOOOOOW.If you have only a page or two WordPress blog, probably it is ok, but not for business use for sure.There are tons of other low-priced webhosting services around, there are many faster than OrangeHost.  You should look elsewhere for better suitable hosts.Also, being an economical provider they have tons of IP that has been in the black lists.  That will be a headache for business user as your emails will not reach or your customers and clients will receive messages that the destination is marked as spammers.  That will be a huge problem.  Just as any other provider, they will not do anything about your IP address past history.  You are your own to deal with many of the spam blacklist entities individually.  Oh, on top of that is that you will not get new IP in exchange nor refund with them.  So good luck.For the final comment, they only refund month-to-month payment type.  So if you took up one-year sign-up to get more discount you are stuck with them for entire duration.  (By the way, most other providers will refunds you for longer sign-up account not on month-to-month)

I have been an avid user of various hosting services throughout my online journey, and I can confidently say that Orange Host stands out as the best hosting provider I have ever come across. The combination of outstanding performance and budget-friendly pricing has made my hosting experience with Orange Host truly exceptional.Performance is undoubtedly the key strength of Orange Host. The speed and reliability of their servers have exceeded my expectations. My website now loads faster than ever, ensuring a seamless and enjoyable experience for my visitors. The uptime has been consistently high, minimizing any potential disruptions to my online presence. The robust infrastructure and cutting-edge technology employed by Orange Host truly set them apart in the competitive hosting industry.One of the aspects that sets Orange Host apart is their commitment to providing top-notch customer support. The support team is not only knowledgeable but also highly responsive. Any queries or concerns I've had were promptly addressed, demonstrating their dedication to customer satisfaction.Affordability is another standout feature of Orange Host. The pricing plans are not only competitive but also transparent, with no hidden fees or surprises. This makes it an ideal choice for individuals and businesses looking for high-quality hosting without breaking the bank. The value for money offered by Orange Host is truly remarkable.The user-friendly interface of Orange Host's control panel adds to the overall positive experience. It simplifies the management of my hosting resources, making it easy for even those with limited technical expertise to navigate and optimize their hosting settings.In conclusion, Orange Host has exceeded my expectations in every aspect of hosting. From unparalleled performance to budget-friendly pricing and exceptional customer support, Orange Host has proven itself to be a reliable and trustworthy partner for my online ventures. I wholeheartedly recommend Orange Host to anyone seeking a hosting provider that delivers on its promises and goes above and beyond to meet user expectations.
